Posts.Content: sam_m wrote: I'm new here, and feeling all over the place.  I found a lump went to drs and got an urgent referal was seen last monday and had ultra sound mamogram and needle test.  Dr said he thought i had a cyst which to be honest made me feel relieved.  On thursday eve was in the shower and had deep red blood come from my nipple.  Went to the drs on friday as i didnt know if this was because of all the tests or if it was a new symptom.  The dr didnt really say much just that i had to wait for the results of the test and for me not to worry.  Is this normal am i worrying myself over nothing ?  Was hoping that maybe someone here had experience the same thing ? Sam x Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: confused !?!? sam_m sam_m

Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2010 05:52AM sam_m wrote: Hi Leaf  Thank you for replying .... I did have a read of the site you posted and am feeling relieved.  Thanks again :0) Sam x
